**Wikipedia summary**:  
<i><b>Chamaenerion angustifolium</b></i> is a perennial herbaceous flowering plant in the willowherb family Onagraceae. It is known in North America as <b>fireweed</b>, in some parts of Canada as <b>great willowherb</b>, in Britain and Ireland as <b>rosebay willowherb</b>. In the United Kingdom it is also known as <b>bombweed</b>,a result of its rapid appearance on city bomb sites during the Blitz of World War&#160;II;</p>...
